titleStmt.title: To a LADY, who sent Compliments to a CLERGYMAN upon the Ten of Hearts.
titleStmt.author: Anonymous

bibl.title: To a LADY, who sent Compliments to a CLERGYMAN upon the Ten of Hearts.
bibl.author: Anonymous

front.head: To a LADY, who sent Compliments to a CLERGYMAN upon the Ten of Hearts.

lg.l: YOUR compliments, dear lady, pray forbear,
Old English services are more sincere;
You send Ten Hearts, the tythe is only mine,
Give me but One, and burn the other Nine.
